thread.title: Japan's robot revolution helps care for the elderly

title: Japan's robot revolution helps care for the elderly
text:
Japan's robot revolution helps care for the elderly 10:54am EDT - 01:07 
Japan’s elderly care centers are playing host to a robot revolution, as the government tackles an ageing population with homegrown electronics expertise. Sara Hemrajani reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japan’s elderly care centers are playing host to a robot revolution, as the government tackles an ageing population with homegrown electronics expertise. Sara Hemrajani reports.
